title: SOLD! - F/S - 1910 T210-2 Old Mill - Lloyd, Danville

posts.post_title: SOLD! - F/S - 1910 T210-2 Old Mill - Lloyd, Danville
posts.post_content:
For sale is a nice 1910 T210 Series 2 card or Lloyd (Danville).  Card has no creasing or wrinkling but has wear at the corners.  Price is $75 shipped.  PayPal or mailed payment is accepted.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Thanks!

Kevin
